QMesyDAQ classes
================

.. module:: nicos.devices.vendor.qmesydaq

These classes are for integration of detectors with MesyTec hardware and
controlled by `QMesyDAQ <http://trac.frm2.tum.de/projects/qmesydaq>`_.
Communication works via the TACO interface of QMesyDAQ.

.. autoclass:: QMesyDAQTimer()

.. autoclass:: QMesyDAQCounter()

.. autoclass:: QMesyDAQMultiChannel()

.. autoclass:: QMesyDAQImage()
